product_name: Planet Bike Superflash Micro Rear Bike Light
long_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode, the itty bitty Superflash Turbo Micro Rear Bike Light is so bright you can even see it in the daylight. Includes high and low power beams and the steady and attention grabbing Super Flash(TM) flashing mode. Includes bike mounts and clip mount for multiple mounting options. Soft-touch power switch accesses flashing or steady mode. Includes 2 N batteries for up to 100 hrs. of runtime.
short_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode, the itty bitty Superflash Turbo Micro Rear Bike Light is so bright you can even see it in the daylight.
